Methods in roborally.model that return Battery
 Battery Facade.createBattery(double initialEnergy, int weight)
          Create a new battery with initial energy equal to initialEnergy and weight equal to weight.

 Set<Battery> Facade.getBatteries(Board board)
          Return a set containing all batteries on board.

          Make robot use battery (if possible).
